categories: Category:Star Wars: The Old Republic voice actors

nodes.text: Tony Armatrading (November 30, 1961–May 10, 2021) was a British actor. He voiced Xalek in the computer game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
Armatrading's other works have included the espionage thriller The Saint (1997), the romantic comedy Notting Hill (1999), and the caper thriller Now You See Me 2.
